website_summaries.verdict: Great all-in-one option for occasional parties and treats. Includes everything a host needs to start serving guests immediately. A best seller in its class.
pros: Includes a variety of flavorful syrups and ice "puck" molds
Produces true shaved ice, not crushed snow cone ice
cons: Ice pucks produce a limited amount of shaved ice
Standard cups may not fit dispenser
Steep learning curve for ideal shaved ice production

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: Being from the South, It’s Very HOT & Humid here. No more waiting in line sweating at the snowball stand, trying not to spill them in the car before getting home. So glad I got this little beauty. It arrived on time. Everything was there. Well packaged. Boxed beautifully. The housing is made of high quality plastic. I really that it’s compact so it doesn’t take up much room. It Shaves the ice almost to a powder consistency 😋The syrups are delish! Love love love this machine. Highly recommend! Thx Hawaiian Shaved Ice for taking pride in your product. Right down to the little details.
customer_reviews.author: Gamma

customer_reviews.title: Not even one snow cone...
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me for Mothers Day because of pregnancy cravings... however it quit working before it even made half a snow cone ☹️ And would not turn back on.. Needless to say we are returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Catlett

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed with my purchase. This is the first shaved ice maker machine I have ever owned. Based on the reviews, I expected an easy to use mashie with delicious output but either my expectations were too high or using it needed some expertise which I lack. The machine is hard to use; it took my some time to make it shave ice. I could not get it to shave fine grained after all, but it was a mixture of shaved and broken peices of ice. Also, I didn’t like the taste of the syrups. So I gave up on it completely after using it a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Morteza

customer_reviews.title: Amazing it's perfect and works great!!!! BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing!!!! 1 pick made 1 bowl, and 4 cones. It's small enough to fit anywhere, god even smaller than my Keurig!!! It works amazing, snow fluffy ice. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amandabears

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, I bought one and it came dirty and looked used but I still tried it Not one snow cone, followed the directions and even watched youtube videos. Returned it and got a replacement figuring that it was defective and guess what?? Same same problem. The motor just makes a whining noise and doesn't turn the ice. Not one snow cone. I have owned plenty of shaved ice makers and have never had a problem. Back this goes
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: You can use regular ice cubes but need to put flat side up..  Becomes a pain in the butt..
customer_reviews.text: PROS...Love the way it came packed.. Very nice and professional.. Love how easy it is to use.. love that it's light weight and clean looking.. CONS. wish the area that you put your cup was taller so you can make a snow cone shape or put a standard tall glass under it..it doesn't shave every piece of ice you put in. There's always a small amount of left over ice. Using it one time isnt a problem its when you make a bunch of shaved ice then that little bit of leftover ice adds up to a bunch of unshaven ice... Wish there was a bigger hopper to put more ice...
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would but it won’t let me leave a review unless I choose at least one star. Ordered this through prime to have it here by 4th of July but it is defective!!! I tried it and it did not work at all. Did not even break the ice much less shave it!!! You can hear like a loose screw in there, or something rattling. I ordered this because it was supposed to be one of the top shaved iced machines but it is absolutely worthless. I paid $60 dollars for trash!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a decent shaved ice machine, but avoiding the $200 price tag of a snowie. I ordered some ice refill containers ahead of time. So when it arrived I was able to test it right away. Boy was I impressed. For the price it’s perfect. Depends on how much pressure you use to the softness of your ice. And the flavors that are with it are good as well.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.O

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: Item came nicely packaged. Once items were washed we realized on our first attempt that something was broken in the motor. Finally got the shaver apart to notice broken plastic pieces in the motor area. Amazon was awesome and shipped out a replacement immediately while also emailing a mailing label for a Kohl’s department store return. Was a Birthday gift for my 4 year old. All my boys were bummed as they were so looking forward to some “snowballs”. Hoping the replacement gets the job done. Seems easy to use if working. Flavoring tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Stefanyak

customer_reviews.title: Broke twice
customer_reviews.text: It was great when it worked. One broke immediately upon receipt and the replacement lasted 2 months and was used a total of 6 times max. Wish I could give it a better review but super disappointed. Outside the return window. Was my kids Christmas gift so that really stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Newell

customer_reviews.title: A little noisy, but who's complaining
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it advertises. It shaves ice. You can get roughly two servings of shaved ice per frozen ice puck. The product is noisy, but it takes like 30 seconds or less to shave the puck, so it's manageable. I was looking at options for something fun like a Snoopy Snow Cone machine to make treats with my daughter and settled on this. I've been extremely pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Presskitboy

customer_reviews.title: No customer service!
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. Didn't even work and Customer service never reached back out to me. Stupid me opened the box, tossed the box and waited to use it at the party I bought it for, for it not to work. The Motor starts, but there is no rotation for the ice to be crushed. Talk about a Debbie downer!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Fryman

customer_reviews.title: 4th of July Favorite
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought this snow cone maker and finally used it on the 4th of July. It worked perfectly. I couldn’t make the snow cones fast enough! This Was extremely easy to use. We bought a bag of ice and used that instead of freezing the discs. We’ll try that another time. The bagged ice created very fluffy, powdery ice. We also bought an additional set of flavors for more variety. This brand of syrup is excellent and I would recommend it. All in all, this was a wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KayB

customer_reviews.title: Surf's up on the North Shore
customer_reviews.text: With this year's dry July in Seattle, and an expected hot August, I reflected back on a previous vacations spent on Oahu's North Shore and the wonderful Hawaiian Ice I got there. So I decided it was time to get my own Hawaiian Ice machine. There were many to choose from $40 to &400 and since I was not planning on serving the entire neighborhood, I went with the less expensive end of the spectrum. The Hawaiian Shaved Ice Machine works great - nice powdery ice just like in Haleiwa. It not only cooled me down, but it brought back many good memories. It was easy to set up and the ice "pucks" work perfectly in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: RamJet

customer_reviews.title: Terrible would give it a zero star if possible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible would give it a zero star if possible. My kids were so excited and waited impatiently to use. Worked for less than 2 minutes not even making one full cup and motor just stopped working. Not worth buying for its price!
customer_reviews.author: zeeshan

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first week!!
customer_reviews.text: This was great until it broke. The plastic inside broke and now it doesn’t work at all. Sent a message to the seller and haven’t gotten a response yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Life saver after tonsillectomy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old who just had a tonsillectomy. What a life saver! For the past 5 days, the only fluid my son has had has been shaved ice from this! Crushed ice even from a blender has been too scratchy for him, water hurts, popsicles hurt, etc. He has lived on shaved ice (even without the syrup!) all week long. It works like a charm! Also - I love the fact that you can use regular ice or freeze ice in the little molds they provide. My ice maker broke this week and having those molds on hand saved us until I could get another ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: pattid

customer_reviews.title: Super fun to use and kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product great for the kids! My 2 little ones love it! Just like snow. Tips: use medium pressure on the button and when you use the ice puck mold included inside start with dome side down. I would give the machine a break when it starts a get a little hot just because I don't want it to burn out. Other than that its a great little machine to use and my kids love it. Keeps them entertained during these crazy times.
customer_reviews.author: Tran

customer_reviews.title: Can't Stop Won't Stop
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for my kids. They like it but I have to be honest, my husband and I like it a whole lot more, we have been eating snow cones non-stop. Amazon sells another variety pack of flavors as well and it's wayyyy cheaper than buying it directly from the vendor. We have put this product through some tough times and it's holding up well so far, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good!!! If you follow the instructions, you'll have no problems at all!! I really recommend using the ice molds that come with the machine. I was very anxious to try it, so I used just regular ice cubes the first time and it got me a little frustrated because it wasn't as fast as I wanted it to be. But once I used the ice blocks made with the molds provided, it was a different story! I got the snow really quick and it looked nice and fluffy. We've tried the blueberry and the grape syrup, and both are delicious. I absolutely recommend it! :D
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Dunker

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This snow cone machine works very well,this was a very good purchase.My kids love it and even the neighborhood kids began to come to our house for snow cones.It got so busy I had to had the ice molds already made so I wouldn't run out.I highly recommend you buy this machine you won't be disappointed. I've had mine for two years now and I'm thinking of getting a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: A loyal customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a Senior male.

customer_reviews.title: this snow cone maker is awesome!

I would definitely recommend this! I would say maybe try buying syrup directly from the Hawaiian site tho cause they syrups this size are half the price of what they are on amazon and the larger ones are only $10...
customer_reviews.author: OmfgReallyNicki

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and works great

When the popcycles were delivered on a dinosaur..

customer_reviews.author: tucsonfood

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with the flavors. My kids said it tastes better than actual shaved ice places. I would have given this 5 stars, but there are NO lids for the ice molds. customer_reviews.title: Used for a gender reveal

customer_reviews.title: Makes really good snow cones.  Best when you freeze your ice in the cups provided.  It isn’t chunky.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a slushy so bad but since Covid we hadn’t bought anything to eat or drink except at the grocery store. So I bought this for him so he could have a slushy whenever he wanted it. He and I love. The only thing I don’t like is he loves the cherry syrup and I can’t find it in a small bottle. Other than that, the ice machine more than met my expectation. It isn’t made cheap or flimsy and the price wasn’t bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Halcomb

customer_reviews.title: It's a big hit at home. I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a big hit at home. I bought it for my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves it along with my children. He wants to do shaved ice every week now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Shaved-Ice Machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is awesome and does a fantastic job making snow-cones. The machine puts out the perfect shaved ice that I grew up loving. The assembly was super easy and after freezing the (2) water cups provided, I was making some delicious snow-cones for my kids. I haven’t pushed it to its limit yet, but I made three snow cones within minutes and could have kept going. I did my homework and compared this brand to others and almost all websites/reviews said the “Hawaiian Ice” brand was the best. I think it’s a great machine and definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MXC1428

customer_reviews.title: For Single use primarily with molded blocks.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for home use. I do not recommend. The unit comes with two molds for ice blocks. Each block will make one large or two small cones. The instructions state that standard cubes can be used. My results were not good with standard cubes. In addition, the unit sits low to the counter and a bowl fills quickly. I would suggest another unit that is designed for cubes only. Flavor was not especially good.
customer_reviews.author: Alwirenut

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! Easy to use! The sweet syrup is very good! Excellent price. I used ice cubes and it worked.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Packaging needs to be improved. Round plastic “pucks” are ovals!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tired the sno cone machine just yet. They need to do a better job with the packaging. The plastic “pucks” were terribly misshapen. Need to try to warm them up and reshape using a bowl or large mug otherwise the ice won’t fit in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lemonbark

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best investment this summer in the midst of a pandemic! I make sno cones whenever I want in comfort of my own home. They taste just as good as any snow cone stand.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Starr

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit for the kids, and makes great, fluffy shaved ice!
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughters (ages 10 and 13) had friends over for the last day of school. This shaved ice maker was a huge hit! One girl even took pictures of it with her phone, to show her parents what she wanted for her birthday. The syrups are tasty, and a little goes a long way. Super easy to make the ice pucks ahead of time, and keep them in a plastic baggie in the freezer, for an instant treat anytime. We keep the syrups in the fridge, too. The ice comes out fluffy, especially if you leave the pucks out to defrost a little (10 - 15 minutes).
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth F.

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: This is our second. Our first is kept at our vacation rental and our customers live it. Cherry seems to be the favorite and we get visitors from around the world. This one is a gift for our daughter because every time we go to the property she has to make her own. You guessed it her favorite flavor is cherry!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rathbun

customer_reviews.title: Small but efficient
customer_reviews.text: My children absolutely love making "snow-cones" with this product. It feels very safe and is easy for them to use. Also, easy to clean up and compact design makes for easy storage. Definitely would recommend for any family who loves shaved ice!
customer_reviews.author: C Davis

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun, easy to use machine for granddaughter who loves sno cones! Great to have the different syrups, the cups & utensils all in one package!
customer_reviews.author: L. Postell

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how well this works, thought it would be cheap and more trouble then it was worth. I was surprised!!!! My grandkids love it
customer_reviews.author: Jim price

customer_reviews.title: Shaved ice enjoyment year round!
customer_reviews.text: I use my shaved ice machine for slushies. I enjoyed snow cones as a kid and still do as an adult. Machine is a little loud, but you'll have that when grinding ice blocks. I make them for neighborhood kids and the grandchildren. Always a crowd pleaser.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Semione

customer_reviews.title: Love this shaved ice machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this shaved ice machine! Got it for my kids for a Christmas present. Very easy to use. We made extra pucks and put them in ziploc bags so we always have several on hand, even though one puck will fill our family of 4 cones generously. The ice is shaved very finely, almost powder like, my kids love it because they say it's just like snow! We can make our sets of snow cones in about 5 minutes or less, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snow doesn't get quite as "snowy" as I would like. Still a little bit chunky
customer_reviews.text: Snow doesn't get quite as "snowy" as I would like. Still a little bit chunky. Not too bad when using the ice from the containers though, but the containers are a lot smaller than I thought. They make enough to fill maybe 4 snow cone papers.

customer_reviews.title: It did not work!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and had it sent to my grandchildren. They anticipated the shaved ice for several days waiting for us to arrive. We froze the water in the disk trays provided and followed the directions; however, as all of them watched anxiously, it did not work. No shaved ice! The company did, however, refund my money, but the children were so disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: It ok!

customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a good product but
customer_reviews.text: First unit gave as a gift. Second unit came in a crushed box to original packaging on product missing the forming cups were missing. The bag with the straws was open. Sent back and received a new one perfectly packaged and the product works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Goldhammer

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it was so easy to use. My 4 year old was able to use it with a little guidance. Makes great snow cones. I rated durability high but I have used it once....it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2nd day

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year said this was his favorite gift that he received for Christmas! It’s so easy to use. And the flavors are so yummy!
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephews bday party and everyone loved it! Make sure to premake extra ice block before hand for unlimited shave ice!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year olds wanted this!
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's fairly easy to use to but s little slow. Of course that's to be expected in this price range. I tried it with regular ice cubes and it worked fine. I hope it last a while!
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well enough
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say but this machine did not work well enough to keep, even though i used the enclosed ice mold, which is very small, you really need a few of these to make 2 good sized snow balls, the ice would not shave properly, kept stopping and sticking, i would have to reposition the ice and start again. Really wanted this machine to work out as I have 2 little great nieces and wanted to keep this near the pool for them to use, just took way too long to fill 1 little cup with ice, Great price but not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: donna tenaglia

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.  Definitely worth it.

I found if you water down the flavor some its much better and lasts longer Also I recommend keeping the flavor syrup in the fridge or it melts half the ice when you poor it on All in all for the price it was a nice buy and would do it again
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Very fine shaved ice
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it's easy to use and the ice when shaved is very fine and genuine to real Hawaiian shaved ice. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Shoup

customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves it, shipping was great, so easy to use , my grandaughters can use this- easy and safe , we make ice and save them in a ziploc bag so we have extras ready , it is HOT so we have put it to work and it passed the test , The local place charges $3 each so in one week with 4 grandkids I am ahead of the game ... really $3 how much does ice cost to make? customer_reviews.title: A Birthday Without Shave Ice
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews but this was such a disappointment, I felt I needed to. I purchased this for my son’s birthday but tested it out a couple days before. Good thing I did a trial run because it didn’t work at all. Similar to other recent reviews, the machine turned on and you can hear the motor but nothing happens. I will be returning this item and now it’s too late to order something else.

customer_reviews.title: Great for at-home shaved ice
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about how well this would work for the price, but it does a really good job. It comes with two containers to freeze ice, which then fit perfectly in the shaver. We have used it almost every night for a good month now. It make fluffy, nice shaved ice. One of the containers of ice makes about three cones. The Hawaiian Shaved Ice Syrup really is superior to other cheaper brands. The machine says it can use regular ice cubes, but I can't imagine that the ice produced would be as fluffy.
